Title: PMM Picnic - 07/16/2022 11:00 AM
ProgramDescription:
नमस्कार मंडळी,


As we enter into summer, especially summer of 2022(with everything returning to normalcy), it is time to go outdoors and have fun.
PMM picnic is a great occasion to come together and enjoy the summer.


When: Saturday July 16, 2022 @ 11am to 4pm


What's happening : Bunch of fun games, nostalgic delicacies, summer social with your friends and I scream, U scream, we all scream for ICE-CREAM !!!

Non- Members can join the PMM Picnic for $20 (Adult), $10 (Child Age 5-12), FREE for children under 5.
If you become a member on or before Picnic day (7/16), then your non member fees will be refunded 100%.

Title: PMM 50 Celebration - 04/09/2022 8:30 AM
ProgramDescription: Philadelphia Marathi Mandal would like to thank you for attending our Golden Jubilee celebration and making the PMM-50 event a grand success. After two days of entertaining programs, it must have been difficult to go back to the routine of daily life. However we hope that the weekend festivities have recharged you and prepared you for the week ahead.

Title: Game Night - In Person - PMM Makar Sankrant  Program Rescheduled To- 02/05/2022 4:00 PM
ProgramDescription:
Due to the forecasted inclement weather, our Sankranti event is rescheduled to Saturday, February 5th at the temple auditorium. Here is the updated RSVP link
Sankranti 2022 will be Game Night with exciting programs planned.

RSVP is a must to attend the program / participate in the Game Night.
It also helps us to organize the event better and get exact count for food ordering.
We will be following all CDC guidelines and protocols for safety against the spread of Covid.
Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) | CDC

The last day to submit your RSVP is Wednesday Feb 02
Venue: Bhartiya Temple, 1612 County Line Rd, Chalfont, PA 18914

Title: PMM Diwali - 12/04/2021 11:00 AM
ProgramDescription:
The PMM Executive Committee (EC) is very excited to welcome everyone to the next in-person event for the Marathi community.

Join us to celebrate Deepavali on 04th Dec, 2021 from 11:00 am onwards at the Bharatiya Temple (1612 County Line Road, Chalfont, PA - 18914).

The day’s events will be as follows:

  • Lunch - Sit down lunch served in the temple auditorium
  • Gruhapravesh - One act play
  • Tea break
  • Selfless - One act play

Please see the attached flyer for more information.
We encourage the PMM community to register and pay online for the annual PMM membership. This will help us ensure contactless processing and social distancing at the registration desk

Members (PMM membership for 2021-2022 purchased online)

-Members who have purchased memberships online may proceed directly to the food distribution station after registration

Non-members have 2 options

-Purchase membership at the registration desk and proceed to the food distribution station with the food tickets

-Pay $20.00 per person for the event and proceed to the food distribution station with the food tickets


PMM Membership:

If you have already renewed your membership, thank you very much! If you have not renewed your membership, then we ask that you please renew it online via the link below:
Membership

Your online membership purchase will help save time, both for you as well as the registration desk personnel on the day of the event and ensure safe interaction for all!

RSVP:

We request members and non-members to please RSVP by 1st Dec, 2021 using the link below:

RSVP for PMM Diwali

This will help us plan better and avoid food wastage. We greatly appreciate your support and cooperation and look forward to seeing you at the PMM Diwali program!

Any further questions, please contact Secy.PhillyMM@gmail.com
Venue: Bhartiya Temple, 1612 County Line Rd, Chalfont, PA 18914

Title: PMM Fall Hike -10/30/2021 9:30 AM
ProgramDescription:
In the spirit of increasing our outdoor activities during this pandemic, PMM would like to bring to you our first ever hiking trip on October 30. Come walk the trails at Ricketts Glen State Park and enjoy the beauty of 21 waterfalls over a 7.2 mile loop or enjoy the natural beauty of the shorter 3.2 miles loop. This is rated as a moderate trail with a 1100 ft. elevation gain and can be enjoyed by adults and kids alike.
Please visit the websites below for more information about hiking in Ricketts Glen State Park
DCNR PA
ALL TRAILS
We will meet in the parking lot by 9:30 am and start the hike at 10:00 am sharp.
Below is the address
Ricketts Glen State Park
695 PA-487
Benton, PA 17814
Hiking shoes are highly recommended since this is a natural trail. Here is a suggested list of items to bring along for an enjoyable experience
  • Water
  • Snack
  • Packed lunch
  • Light jacket in case the temperatures drop
  • Rain poncho
This is a popular trail and parking is limited so please try to carpool if possible. Please RSVP by Oct 23rd using the following link
PMM Hiking trip 30th Oct

Title: Marathi Musical Program ' ताने स्वर रंगवावा '
ProgramDescription:
PMM Executive Committee (EC) is very excited to announce

the In-Person PMM Ganapati Program, Marathi musical ताने स्वर रंगवावा

Saturday, September 11, 2021 (11:00 AM onwards)

We are making every effort to conduct this program with our members' safety in mind.

We are working with the Philadelphia Ganesh Festival (PGF) team to explore the possibility

of holding this program outdoors. We will be following all the masking and social

distancing guidelines set by the PGF committee as per mandates from the state.

Please stay tuned for additional details and the timeline for the PMM Ganapati Program.
Venue: Bhartiya Temple, 1612 County Line Rd, Chalfont, PA 18914
